updated_cases.title: Verify that we are loading all the tenants when we set the flag as "preload-all-tenants"  to true in all-tenant proxy
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify that we are loading all the tenants when we set the flag as "preload-all-tenants"  to true in all-tenant proxy
updated_cases.custom_preconds: Stack should be up and running
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Bring up proxy
2. Make sure proper configurations are present
3. Send the required traffic wherever applicable
updated_cases.custom_expected: We should load all the tenants here

updated_cases.title: Verify that we are not loading  all the tenants when we set the flag as "preload-all-tenants"  to falsein all-tenant proxy
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify that we are not loading  all the tenants when we set the flag as "preload-all-tenants"  to falsein all-tenant proxy
updated_cases.custom_preconds: Stack should be up and running
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Bring up proxy
2. Make sure proper configurations are present
3. Send the required traffic wherever applicable
updated_cases.custom_expected: We should load the tenants only we receives the traffic from that tenant

updated_cases.title: Verify that ,In single tenant  mode "preload-all-tenants" flag does not have any significance in tenant loading in the proxy

updated_cases.custom_steps:

2. Make sure proper configurations are present
3. Send the required traffic wherever applicable
updated_cases.custom_expected: We should not have any effect here

updated_cases.title: If the tenant is in Emergency_Bypass mode, Verify whether we are loading the tenant config when we receive the traffic from that tenant

2. Make sure proper configurations are present

updated_cases.custom_expected: We should load the tenant but it should be bypassed mode

updated_cases.title: Verify that Proxy is loading the tenant config files in its memory as soon it receives the traffic for the fitst time from the tenants which is not loaded in proxy memory

updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Bring up proxy
2. Make sure proper configurations are present
3. Send the required traffic wherever applicable
updated_cases.custom_expected: We should be able to load the tenant

updated_cases.title: Whenever proxy receives the traffic from the tenant which is already loaded , Verify that Proxy is not loading same tenant again and again in its memory
updated_cases.custom_summary: Whenever proxy receives the traffic from the tenant which is already loaded , Verify that Proxy is not loading same tenant again and again in its memory
updated_cases.custom_preconds: Stack should be up and running
updated_cases.custom_steps:

2. Make sure proper configurations are present
3. Send the required traffic wherever applicable
updated_cases.custom_expected: We should not load tenant which is already loaded
